TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit SecurityTokenProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示为 SOAP 消息发送方处理安全令牌的安全令牌提供程序。

span.span: Represents a security token provider that handles security tokens for a SOAP message sender.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当需要自定义安全令牌时，使用 类。Use the class when custom security tokens are required. 安全令牌提供程序的任务是：当客户端发送 SOAP 消息，并且使用安全令牌对客户端进行身份验证或保护 SOAP 消息时，获取安全令牌。The role of a security token provider is to get a security token when a SOAP message is sent by a client and a security token is used to authenticate the client or to protect the SOAP message. 具体来说，就是调用 方法来获取安全令牌。Specifically, the method is called to get a security token. 也可以调用安全令牌提供程序，使用 和 方法来取消和续订安全令牌。The security token provider can also be called to cancel and renew a security using the and methods. 从 类派生的类实现 方法可以确定对于给定的安全令牌，需要哪个安全令牌提供程序。Classes that derive from the class implement the method to determine which security token provider is required for a given security token. 和 类提供了内置安全令牌类型的默认实现。The and classes provide the default implementations for built-in security token types. 对于自定义安全令牌方案，必须从 、 或 类之一派生一个类，并提供为自定义安全令牌创建安全令牌提供程序、安全令牌身份验证器和安全令牌序列化程序的功能。For custom security token scenarios, you must derive a class from one of the , , or classes and provide the functionality to create the security token provider, security token authenticator, and security token serializer for the custom security token. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 创建自定义令牌，请参阅[如何： 创建自定义令牌](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md)。 creating a custom token, see [How to: Create a Custom Token](~/docs/framework/wcf/extending/how-to-create-a-custom-token.md). ## Examples [!code-csharp[SecurityTokenProvider#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/securitytokenprovider/cs/samlsecuritytokenprovider.cs#0)] [!code-vb[SecurityTokenProvider#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/securitytokenprovider/vb/samlsecuritytokenprovider.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected SecurityTokenProvider ();

Protected Sub New ()
protected: SecurityTokenProvider();

MemberSignature.Value: public IAsyncResult BeginCancelToken (TimeSpan timeout, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityToken token, AsyncCallback callback, object state);

Public Function BeginCancelToken (timeout As TimeSpan, token As SecurityToken, callback As AsyncCallback, state As Object) As IAsyncResult
public: IAsyncResult ^ BeginCancelToken(TimeSpan timeout, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SecurityToken ^ token, AsyncCallback ^ callback, System::Object ^ state);

param.name: timeout
param.span: 一个 ，它为取消安全令牌的消息指定超时值。

span.span: A that specifies the timeout value for the message that cancels the security token.

param.name: token
param.span: 要取消的 。

span.span: The to cancel.

param.name: callback
param.span: 接收异步关闭操作完成通知的 委托。

span.span: The delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous close operation.

param.name: state
param.span: 一个由应用程序指定的对象，它包含与异步关闭操作相关联的状态信息。

span.span: An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous close operation.

summary.span: 开始异步操作以取消安全令牌。

span.span: Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel a security token.
The that references the asynchronous cancel operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以取消的安全令牌（例如颁发的安全令牌）允许请求安全令牌的客户端在使用完毕后取消该安全令牌。A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.

span.span: The method is called by the method.

para.span: 在派生类中，不需要重写异步方法（这些方法具有前缀 Begin 和 End）。

span.span: The asynchronous methods, which have a prefix of Begin and End, do not need to be overridden in derived classes.

para.span: 基类提供了基于同步方法的异步实现。

span.span: The base class provides an asynchronous implementation that is based on the synchronous methods.

span.span: Therefore, you are not required to override the method, unless you need to provide your own asynchronous implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当客户端发送 SOAP 消息并且需要安全令牌时， 类会调用 方法。The method is called by the class when a client sends a SOAP message and a security token is required. 方法调用 方法。The method calls the method. 在大多数情况下，`timeout` 的派生类（如 ）不使用 参数。In most cases the `timeout` parameter is not used by derived classes of such as . 但有时检索安全令牌会涉及分布式消息。However, sometimes retrieving a security token involves distributed messaging. 联合服务中使用的 就是一个例子。An example is used in a federated service. 在这类情况下，`timeout` 参数用于避免因网络故障、消息丢失或其他错误情况引起的异常。In these cases the `timeout` parameter is used to avoid exceptions caused by network failures, message loss, and other error conditions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以续订的颁发安全令牌允许客户端在安全令牌即将到期或已经到期时续订该安全令牌。An issued security token that is renewable allows a client to renew it when the security token is about to or has expired. 方法调用 方法。The method calls the method.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否可以取消安全令牌。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the security token can be cancelled.

value.span: 如果可以取消安全令牌，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the security token can be cancelled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以取消的安全令牌（例如颁发的安全令牌）允许请求安全令牌的客户端在使用完毕后取消该安全令牌。A security token that can be cancelled, such as one that is issued, allows a client that requested a security token to cancel it when it is done with it.
